attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Permanently place a statue of Jennifer (Jen) McEwan, on the fourth plinth in Trafalgar Square.

rejection.details: Decisions regarding what can be placed on the fourth plinth are outside the Government's remit, please visit http://london.gov.uk/fourthplinth/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
